items.sentence: Tom didn't realize that he shouldn't be doing what he was doing.
If you don't have other plans, let's go out for dinner together.
Violent clashes broke out between the protesters and the police.
Tom was very squeamish and would pass out at the sight of blood.
Tom wanted to apologize to Mary, but he didn't have a chance to.
I was wondering if you thought what Tom did was the right thing.
All the waitresses like Tom because he always leaves large tips.
I suspect Tom and Mary are the only ones who'll have to do that.
I don't think that you need to tell Tom why you don't like Mary.
Tom told me he wasn't at all interested in what Mary had to say.
